name: tiktok_bulk_search
description: Search multiple queries on TikTok in parallel using concurrent browser tabs. Use this instead of calling tiktok_search multiple times - it is faster and more efficient. Pass all queries as a single comma-separated string. Example: 'cooking tips,dance challenge,funny cats'.

parameters.name: queries
parameters.description: Comma-separated search queries (e.g. 'recipe ideas,workout routine,travel vlog')

detailSteps.code: const results = []; const items = document.querySelectorAll('[data-e2e="search_video-item"], .search-card-container'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(items.length, 5); i++) { const el = items[i]; const descEl = el.querySelector('[data-e2e="search-card-desc"] a, .card-desc a, a[title]'); const creatorEl = el.querySelector('[data-e2e="search-card-user-unique-id"], [data-e2e="creator-uniqueid"], .author-uniqueid'); const viewsEl = el.querySelector('[data-e2e="search-card-like-count"], .video-count, strong.view-count'); const likesEl = el.querySelector('[data-e2e="search-card-like-count"], .like-count'); const thumbEl = el.querySelector('img[src*="tiktokcdn"], img.poster, picture img'); const linkEl = el.querySelector('a[href*="/video/"], a[href*="/@"]'); results.push({ description: descEl ? descEl.textContent.trim().substring(0, 300) : '', creator: creatorEl ? creatorEl.textContent.trim() : '', views: viewsEl ? viewsEl.textContent.trim() : '', likes: likesEl ? likesEl.textContent.trim() : '', thumbnail: thumbEl ? thumbEl.src : '', url: linkEl ? linkEl.href : '' }); } const params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search); return { query: params.get('q') || '', result_count: results.length, results: results }
detailSteps.name: search_results
detailSteps.label: Extract results
